arguments.argument: for (i = 0; i < 6; i += 1) { info[i] = ds_list_find_value(lobbies, i + offset) players[i] = json_pick(info[i], 'players') _room[i].roomId = json_pick(info[i], 'id') _room[i].roomName = json_pick(info[i], 'name') _room[i].roomMode = json_pick(info[i], 'mode') _room[i].hostName = ds_list_find_value(players[i], 0) _room[i].playerCount = ds_list_size(players[i]) _room[i].needPass = json_pick(info[i], 'needPass') }
